name: Hidden Object: Golden Trails - Secret of the Princess
summary: Join Princess Diana and her younger brother as they unravel family secrets and face breathtaking adventure! Diana has dreamed of finding the hidden gold that her grandmother, hid long ago. When Diana’s parents leave her and her brother Bobby at home for a day, Bobby suddenly goes missing. Solving this strange disappearance is the first step, eventually leading Diana and her brother to an ancient treasure map! Test your skills with challenging puzzles that will take you from strange rooms to the dangerous depths of the ocean. With its charming characters, engaging storyline and plethora of puzzles, this game is an irresistible hidden object adventure!
